parameter.name: campaignId
parameter.description: The campaign Identifier to list emails clickers

parameter.name: date
parameter.description: Opens on or after the date value specified will be returned

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: The results page to retrieve. Default valus is 1

parameter.name: pageSize
parameter.description: The number of records to retrieve per results page. Default valus is 1000

parameter.name: orderField
parameter.description: The field (out of email,list or date) which should be used to order the results. Default valus is email

parameter.name: orderDirection
parameter.description: The direction in which results should be ordered. Default value is asc.
